title: SOLD: 1908 Reading Tri-State Postcard - Home Run Baker Pre-Rookie
author: Kris19

posts.post_title: SOLD: 1908 Reading Tri-State Postcard - Home Run Baker Pre-Rookie
posts.post_content:
1908 Reading Tri-State Base Ball Team featuring a 22-year old Frank "Home Run" Baker who would be purchased later that season by the Philadelphia Athletics on his way to a Hall of Fame career.  Standing next to Baker is T206 favorite Shag Shaugnessy.

Recently graded a 2 Good by SGC.  I can only find four PSA and SGC graded copies of this postcard, this being the only 2, with only one graded higher.  

SOLD delivered, net to me, with PayPal F/F payment preferred.  Please PM or email [url]kris.sweckard@sbcglobal.net[/url]

Thanks!
